Workshop

Free Workshop: How to Write Emails That Win You Clients

Live this Thursday, March 5th, at 2:00pm EST (11:00am PST).

Register now to receive your personal invite.

<%= image_tag("people.png", :id => "top", :style => "margin: 0em 0 -1em; width: 150px;") %>

“I’m spending less time writing email but booking more projects.”
- Jarrod Drysdale

Can't make it? Sign up anyway to get the replay!

Learn to write crisp, compelling emails that win you more work in less time.

You'll discover how to write emails that:

  • Get read and avoid the spam folder.
  • Address real needs and compel clients to respond.
  • Get a natural conversation going that's insanely interesting.
  • Above all else, are damn good at winning you work.

Your hosts:


Joanna Wiebe
Your favorite copywriting mentor. Creator of Copyhackers.


Robert Williams
Creator of Workshop, author of Emails That Win You Clients.
